title: After the software update, rear camera didn't work and I had to pay to replace it. Can I get a refun
content:
I just regret that I chose to buy a Google phone!
I can't contact with anyone physically, like call somewhere and talk about the problem I faced with my pixel 2 XL.
After the latest update to Android 11, the rear camera stopped working and I had to pay to replace it!
I still can't believe that a company like Google is so bad and it would make me pay money to replace a camera on my phone, just because they released a new software update!!
I feel like they just robbed me!
I won't recommend it again to anyone and definitely my next phone will be everything else EXCEPT GOOGLE!!!
